radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: MRI of the spine and sacrum
radiographic_examinations.findings: Bilateral sacro-ileitis and active bilateral sacro-ileitis with chronic changes on repeat.

Diffuse uptake throughout the stomach, mild focal uptake in the caecum and ascending colon, avid 21 Ã— 16 mm enlarged para-aortic lymph node uptake, and multiple mildly to moderately avid enlarged mesenteric nodes.
Small hyperintense FLAIR/T2 signal foci in the subcortical white matter of the frontal lobes bilaterally.
